issues.description: Headline 'Your Business Operating System' is too generic and doesn't differentiate from competitors
issues.rationale: Fails to communicate unique value or specific problem solved for small business owners

issues.description: 3-column benefit grid uses vague terms ('Visibility', 'Control') without concrete outcomes
issues.rationale: Small business owners need specific, measurable benefits not abstract concepts

issues.description: FAQ accordion for pricing doesn't proactively address ROI or cost justification
issues.rationale: Small businesses need clear financial value proposition before exploring FAQ

issues.description: Single video testimonial insufficient for addressing diverse control fears across industries
issues.rationale: Different business types have unique delegation concerns requiring varied proof points

issues.description: 3-column comparison lacks clear upgrade triggers between Basic/Standard/Premium
issues.rationale: Users can't identify which tier matches their growth stage without clear thresholds

issues.description: Bullet points under pricing cards don't quantify value or savings per feature
issues.rationale: Missing concrete metrics like hours saved or revenue impact per feature

issues.description: Tagline 'Hand it off without losing control' creates cognitive dissonance
issues.rationale: Contradictory messaging confuses rather than reassures anxious business owners

issues.description: 5 customer logos without context or results achieved provides weak social proof
issues.rationale: Logos alone don't communicate transformation or success metrics

issues.description: Muted red for urgency conflicts with trust-building blue creating mixed signals
issues.rationale: Color psychology contradiction undermines consistent emotional response

issues.description: Bold sans-serif headline font lacks differentiation from typical SaaS competitors
issues.rationale: Generic typography fails to establish memorable brand identity

suggestedFixes.fix: Change to 'Turn chaos into systems in 30 days - guaranteed' with specific transformation promise
suggestedFixes.rationale: Concrete timeline and guarantee directly address small business urgency

suggestedFixes.fix: Replace with '10hrs/week saved', '3x faster onboarding', '50% fewer errors' quantified benefits
suggestedFixes.rationale: Measurable outcomes resonate with ROI-focused business owners

suggestedFixes.fix: Add ROI calculator above FAQ showing break-even at 2.3 months average
suggestedFixes.rationale: Proactive value demonstration beats reactive objection handling

suggestedFixes.fix: Create 3-tab testimonial section: Retail, Services, Online - industry-specific proof
suggestedFixes.rationale: Targeted social proof addresses specific delegation concerns per vertical

suggestedFixes.fix: Add growth indicators: 'Basic: 1-3 employees', 'Standard: 4-10', 'Premium: 11+' clear thresholds
suggestedFixes.rationale: Business size mapping helps instant tier identification

suggestedFixes.fix: Show dollar value saved per feature: 'Automation: saves $500/mo' with calculations
suggestedFixes.rationale: Financial quantification justifies pricing at each tier

suggestedFixes.fix: Update tagline to 'Systems that scale without the stress' - positive framing
suggestedFixes.rationale: Eliminates contradiction while maintaining control benefit

suggestedFixes.fix: Add mini case results under logos: 'Acme: 40% growth', 'Beta Co: 8hrs saved weekly'
suggestedFixes.rationale: Context transforms logos into compelling success stories

suggestedFixes.fix: Replace red urgency with gold/amber for 'premium opportunity' psychology
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains urgency while aligning with trust-building palette

suggestedFixes.fix: Use modern serif for headlines to convey established expertise and premium positioning
suggestedFixes.rationale: Serif typography differentiates from typical SaaS while building authority
